煤烟: (ばいえん) - dirty smoke; soot and smoke
煤煙: (ばいえん) - dirty smoke; soot and smoke
煤竹: (すすだけ) - soot-colored bamboo (coloured); bamboo duster (with the leaves still attached at one end)
煤色信天翁: (ススイロアホウドリ) - sooty albatross (Phoebetria fusca)
煤色面梟: (ススイロメンフクロウ) - sooty owl (Tyto tenebricosa); greater sooty owl
照々坊主: (てるてるぼうず) - paper doll to which children pray for fine weather (usu. white, and shaped like a Buddhist priest)
照らし出す: (てらしだす) - to illuminate; to shine a light on; to light up
照らし合わせる: (てらしあわせる) - to check; to compare
照らす: (てらす) - to shine on/to illuminate; to compare (with)/to refer to
照り: (てり) - sunshine; dry weather; luster; lustre
照りかえし: (てりかえし) - reflection; reflected light; reflected heat; glare
照りつける: (てりつける) - to blaze down on; to beat down on; to shine down upon
照り上がる: (てりあがる) - to become bright with sunlight following a shower
照り付ける: (てりつける) - to blaze down on; to beat down on; to shine down upon
照り合う: (てりあう) - to shed light on each other
照り映える: (てりはえる) - to shine; to glow
照り焼: (てりやき) - teriyaki (meat or fish marinated in sweet soy sauce and broiled)
照り焼き: (てりやき) - teriyaki (meat or fish marinated in sweet soy sauce and broiled)
照り輝く: (てりかがやく) - to shine brilliantly
照り込む: (てりこむ) - to shine into or upon
照り返し: (てりかえし) - reflection; reflected light; reflected heat; glare
照り返す: (てりかえす) - to reflect; to throw back light
照る: (てる) - to shine; (from 面照る)  to look slightly upward (of a noh mask; indicating joy, etc.)
照る照る坊主: (てるてるぼうず) - paper doll to which children pray for fine weather (usu. white, and shaped like a Buddhist priest)
照れる: (てれる) - to be shy; to be bashful; to feel awkward; to feel embarrassed
照れ屋: (てれや) - shy; a very shy person
照付ける: (てりつける) - to blaze down on; to beat down on; to shine down upon
照会: (しょうかい) - inquiry; enquiry; query; reference
照会状: (しょうかいじょう) - reference letter; letter of inquiry; letter of enquiry
照会用端末: (しょうかいようたんまつ) - inquiry station
照会言語: (しょうかいげんご) - query language
照合の上: (しょうごうのうえ) - after checking up
照合写真: (しょうごうしゃしん) - portal film (e.g. in radiotherapy)
照合操作: (しょうごうそうさ) - collation operation
照合順序: (しょうごうじゅんじょ) - collating sequence
照合順番: (しょうごうじゅんばん) - collating sequence
照射: (ともし) - (灯 only) light/lamp; (esp. 照射) baiting deer with a lighted torch
照射方向: (しょうしゃほうこう) - light source direction
照射線量: (しょうしゃせんりょう) - exposure dose
照射野: (しょうしゃや) - irradiation field (of X-rays)
照尺: (しょうしゃく) - sight (of a firearm)
照度計: (しょうどけい) - illuminometer; luminometer; illuminance meter
照応: (しょうおう) - correspondence; being in accordance with; anaphora
照明灯: (しょうめいとう) - light used for brightly lighting up a plaza, building, etc.
照星: (しょうせい) - bead or front sight of a firearm
照査: (しょうさ) - checking against (up); examining by reference; verification
照準: (しょうじゅん) - sight (e.g. of a gun); aim; alignment
照準を合わせる: (しょうじゅんをあわせる) - to set one's sights on; to take aim (at); to have one's mind on
照準器: (しょうじゅんき) - sighting device; sights
照準記号: (しょうじゅんきごう) - aiming symbol; aiming circle; aiming field
照焼: (てりやき) - teriyaki (meat or fish marinated in sweet soy sauce and broiled)
照焼き: (てりやき) - teriyaki (meat or fish marinated in sweet soy sauce and broiled)
照照坊主: (てるてるぼうず) - paper doll to which children pray for fine weather (usu. white, and shaped like a Buddhist priest)
照臨: (しょうりん) - looking down (from the heavens); visit of a high-ranking person
照葉樹林: (しょうようじゅりん) - evergreen (glossy-leaved) forest
照葉樹林文化: (しょうようじゅりんぶんか) - East Asian evergreen forest culture (theory)
照葉狂言: (てりはきょうげん) - type of theater which combines elements of noh, kyogen, and kabuki with dances and popular songs (theatre)
煩い: (わずらい) - (esp. 煩い) worry/agony/vexation; (esp. 患い) illness/sickness
煩い付く: (わずらいつく) - to become sick; to fall ill; to be confined to bed
煩う: (わずらう) - (esp. 患う) to be ill/to suffer from; (esp. 煩う) to worry about/to be concerned about; (esp. 煩う, after the -masu stem of a verb) to have trouble doing .../to be unable to .../to fail to ...
煩がる: (うるさがる) - to feel annoyed at
煩さい: (ウルサイ) - noisy/loud; annoying/troublesome/tiresome/persistent/importunate; fussy/finicky/picky/particular/nagging/fastidious/bossy; shut up!/be quiet!
煩さがる: (うるさがる) - to feel annoyed at
煩わす: (わずらわす) - to trouble; to bother; to annoy; to give trouble
煩わせる: (わずらわせる) - to trouble; to bother; to annoy
煩を避ける: (はんをさける) - to spare the trouble (of doing)
煩労: (はんろう) - trouble; pains; backbreaking exertions
煩多: (はんた) - multiplicity of troubles; so many as to be troublesome
煩忙: (はんぼう) - pressure of business; busy
煩悩: (bonnou) - worldly desires, evil passions, appetites of the flesh; klesha (pensamentos poluentes como ganância, ódio e ilusão, que resultam em sofrimento)
煩悩具足: (ぼんのうぐそく) - (yoji) possessing worldly desires and passions
煩悩魔: (ぼんのうま) - demon of ill desires that injures one's body and mind
